title: Sampler, 1786
medium:
Medium: wool on linen
Technique: cross and satin stitches on plain weave foundation. Counted stitches.
signed: "Gra---m--er wrought this in the 12 year of her age 1786."
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Two alphabets and a set of numerals, a row of crowns identified K, Q, P, D, and E.  "Gra---m--er wrought this in the 12 year of her age 1786."  Assorted trees and animals at the bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1786.
1786. Medium: wool on linen
Technique: cross and satin stitches on plain weave foundation. Counted stitches.. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1976-100-59.
